text: Tank is a 1984 American action comedy movie directed by Marvin J. Chomsky and starring James Garner, Shirley Jones, C. Thomas Howell, Mark Herrier, James Cromwell, Jenilee Harrison. It was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1984 action movies Category:1984 comedy movies Category:1980s American action movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies set in Georgia (U.S. state) Category:Movies set in Tennessee Category:Movies directed by Marvin J. Chomsky
title: Tank (movie)
